Segment.name: F01
Segment.comment: To identify a loss or damage claim

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: SupportingEvidenceCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether documents are provided to support evidence to a loss or damage claim

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

Field.name: ExchangeRate
Field.comment: Value to be used as a multiplier conversion factor to convert monetary value from one currency to another

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code
